channel.title: [718] Adding Particles too Completionist Cape Rack
channel.description:
Hey Guys, I'm working on a 718 server and i'm wanting too add the particles that show at the bottom of the comp cape too the rack, I know this can be done as i have seen it on another server.
http://puu.sh/9uXYj/0ee655b541.jpg
any ideas?

item.title: [718] Adding Particles too Completionist Cape Rack
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

where would i find such code?

Read full topic

item.title: [718] Adding Particles too Completionist Cape Rack
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Take the code that made the particles show on the cape model you’re wearing, and apply it to the model on the rack.
Magic.
I couldn’t find anything in particular on making the rack have particles, so yeah

Read full topic
item.source: [718] Adding Particles too Completionist Cape Rack
